DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To discern potential mechanism ( ) high saturate fat feed disrupts normal skeletal muscle metabolism . Our work hypothesis high saturate fat feeding increase gut permeability blood endotoxin , elicit pro-inflammatory signal skeletal muscle alters normal adaptive response meal . Preliminary evidence use model acute ( 5 day ) , high saturate fat feeding , isocaloric habitual intake , healthy , non-obese human present herein support hypothesis . Background : The inability skeletal muscle adapt fuel oxidation fuel availability term metabolic inflexibility , well characterized feature disease state obesity , metabolic syndrome , type 2 diabetes ( T2D ) . Moreover , establish link gut permeability , metabolic endotoxemia , skeletal muscle metabolic function human . Approach . We propose utilize model acute high fat feed healthy human study interplay gut function , blood endotoxin , skeletal muscle pro-inflammatory signal metabolic adaptability . We employ two-week lead-in period , research participant feed prepared meal isocaloric habitual diet , follow five day high saturate fat feeding . The high saturate fat feeding period consist prepared meal isocaloric habitual diet macronutrient composition 50 % fat ( 45 % saturated fat ) , 35 % carbohydrate , 15 % protein . Studying healthy , nonobese human context innovative approach two level : 1 ) confounding influence associate metabolic disease ( obesity , diabetes , metabolic syndrome ) eliminate , e.g. , insulin resistance , hyperlipidemia , impaired gut function , pre-existing metabolic dysfunction inflammatory tone ; 2 ) isocaloric feed design negates confound influence positive energy balance allow u specifically examine effect acutely increase dietary saturate fat .
DOC.criteria: Males , age 1840 year ; BMI 20 30 kg/m2 . Weight stable previous 6 month ( ± 2.0kg ) . Sedentary recreationally active ( ≤ 3 day , 20 min/day walk type exercise , plan exercise leisure walk transportation purpose ) . Verbal write informed consent nonsmoking Approved participation Medical Director ( Jose Rivero , M.D . ) 1 . Past current ischemic heart disease , stroke , respiratory disease , endocrine metabolic disease , neurological disease , hematologicaloncological disease 2 . Family history diabetes 3 . BMI > 30 kg/m2 , blood pressure > 140/90 mmHg antihypertensive medication , fast glucose > 100 mg/dl , LDL cholesterol > 130 mg/dl , total cholesterol > 200 mg/dl , triglycerides > 250 mg/dl . 4 . Verbal write informed consent 4 . Smoking , alcohol consumption > 2 servings/d , take medication ( include limit statin drug antiinflammatory action ) antioxidant vitamin supplement , know affect carbohydrate lipid metabolism . 5 . Total daily dietary fat consumption ≥ 35 % and/or saturate fat consumption ≥ 15 % .
